resources.string: The best way to prepare for your CBT exams
Get access to past and likely exam questions
Pass your exams by learning from your mistakes
This app allows you to access past and likely questions from the computer based exams of previous years
It simulates real exam conditions with timed sessions and trick questions so that you know exactly how to take your papers on the D-day
With expertly prepared corrections, you\'ll know exactly where you went wrong and pass your exams with flying colours

For questions and enquiries on how to get a PIN and fully access the app, join the WhatsApp group or contact any of the people below. A PIN costs ₦200. For information on PIN wholesale opportunities, contact Biodun.
Pay With ATM Card or USSD

These two factors, the altitude and the weather, tend separately and together to defeat the climber. The height weakens, slows him down, it forces him to spend days and night in the course of his assault on the summit; the weather, besides adding to the demands of his energy and moral fortitude, conspires to deny him thetime he needs to complete his mission. Whereas in lower mountains and on easy ground the weather may be no more than a handicap, in the high Himalayas it is decisive, regardless of terrain. \nThe deduction to be drawn from these two factors was clear enough. We must either so fortify ourselves that we could continue, without detriment, to live our being above limit of natural acclimatization, or better still, we must solve the problem of speed. It was desirable, in fact that we should meet both these requirements and thus give to these chosen to attempt the summit and to their supporting teams some measure of ignorance against the vagaries of the weather, for safety in mountain climbing is as much a matter of swiftness as of sureness of foot. Either or both could be achieved only by the administration of oxygen in sufficient quantities to make up for the deficiency in the air, and for the duration of the upward journey above limit of successful acclimatization.
It is highly recommend to close Mobile DATA, Receivers may be able to use mobile data.
Allow app to read/write System settings. Necessary to create a Wifi Hotspot for Offline File Transfers

string.name: p2p_connect_to_diff_sender
string.u: Click here to connect to a different Sender

resources.string: Found a SENDER with SSID: %s. \nPlease click on Settings to Open Wifi Listings and connect to above SSID along with Password shared by Sender.
Failed to connect with %s Hotspot. Retrying again..
Could not connect to SHAREthem Hotspot. Please go to Wifi settings and chose %s to start video transfer from Sender.
Do you want to turn-off Receiver mode?
Without Location(GPS) permission Spuul app is unable to Receive videos offline from Senders. Are you sure to deny this permission?
Please enable Location(GPS) permission to proceed with receiving Spuul videos Offline.\nPress Settings button and goto Permissions section to grant LOCATION PERMISSION(GPS)

• Open Receiver App in 'Receiver mode' 

(OR)

• Open WiFi settings and connect to: 
SSID: %s
Password: %s
 And then enter below URL into browser's address bar
%s
Do you want to stop sharing files?
Turn ON \'Send Files\' to start File Sharing
Turn ON \'Receive Files\' to receive files from Sender
